pizzaguy.title: For the Love of Pizza
pizzaguy.memory_context: Where relationship discussions first happened, inconsistent pizza, walked from here to first kiss location

options.title: Documentary Style
options.description: Interview someone at Pizzaguy about their relationship with pizza/love. Film pizza-making process at Pinocchio. Edit together: pizza-making visuals with interview audio overlay.

options.title: Pizza Moments
options.description: 5-photo series of 'pizza moments' at Pizzaguy. Capture different emotions: first bites, anticipation, hands reaching for slices.

options.title: Pizza Ritual
options.description: 60-second video of pizza-making process at Pinocchio with natural sound. Focus on craft/ritual of making something that brings people together.

options.title: Your Take
options.description: Use the core concept of 'pizza and relationships' to create your own interpretation. Any format, any approach that connects food and connection.

district24.title: 24/7 Love Story
district24.memory_context: Home away from home, daily hangout spot, know all the staff, 24-hour location with consistently average food

options.title: Time Transformation
options.description: Choose any single public space. Document it over 24 hours with photos/video clips every 2-3 hours. Edit into 90-second piece showing how space transforms throughout day/night cycle.

options.title: Same Spot, Different Times
options.description: 5-photo series of same exact spot at 5 different times over 24 hours. Show how lighting, people, and mood change in one location.

options.title: Space in Motion
options.description: 60-second time-lapse of one space over several hours. Focus on rhythm and flow of how spaces change throughout the day.

social_ghana.title: Social Butterfly Effect
social_ghana.memory_context: Weekend hangout spot, always crowded, mix of local and international crowd, good vibes

options.title: Crowd Dynamics
options.description: Document how different groups interact in the same space. Create a 90-second piece about social connections and disconnections.

options.title: Social Moments
options.description: 5-photo series capturing different types of social interactions - laughter, conversations, solitude in crowds.

options.title: Weekend Energy
options.description: 60-second video capturing the energy and atmosphere of Social Ghana on a typical weekend.
